event.event-label: OpenNMS-defined remote poller event: A remote poller detected a node lost service
event.descr: A %service% outage was identified on interface %interface% from remote poller %parm[locationMonitorId]% from location: %parm[location]%.
event.logmsg: %service% outage identified on interface %interface% from the remote poller %parm[locationMonitorId]% in location %parm[location]% with reason code: %parm[eventReason]%.

event.event-label: OpenNMS-defined remote poller event: A remote poller detected a node regained service
event.descr:
The %service% service on interface %interface% was previously down as viewed by remote poller %parm[locationMonitorId]% and has been restored.

This event is generated when a service which had previously failed polling attempts is again responding to polls by OpenNMS.
event.logmsg: %service% outage identified on interface %interface% from the remote poller %parm[locationMonitorId]% in location %parm[location]% has cleared.
